Description:
312373733 - You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to substances hazardous to health, namely metal working fluids, is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.

312373764 - You have failed to ensure that your employees who are, or are liable to be, exposed to substances hazardous to health, namely weld fume and metalworking fluids, are under a suitable programme of health surveillance.
